entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 13 March 2023
